name: Sky Jump (itch) (BasementStudios)
description:
This is a game i made in game maker studio. It's not my first but it's the first one I uploaded. Hooray for subscriptions I guess. This is a scrolling up game where you need to jump up and avoid spikes and pits. Don't touch the bottom of the screen or the spikes. You have 3 lives ❤️❤️❤️ after each win or loss. Use them wisely. Touch the checkerboard to win and use     W⏫     A◀️     and D▶️     to move. 

there is some white text whizzing across the bottom of the screen. use screen snip and this link to find out the message https://cryptii.com/pipes/hex-decoder
